text: @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive #FitIndiaTalks Pranam Sir,I am a NEET 2020 aspirant and my query is about our mental fitness issue we are facing at the moment due to increasing number of cases of COVID19. Is it possible for a student to wear PPE & face mask for 3 hours If the exam happend in 26th july?
